content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 5, Liverpool 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 5, Liverpool 0.
Goal!  Manchester City 5, Liverpool 0. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Kyle Walker.
Attempt saved. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Leroy Sané.
Foul by Joel Matip (Liverpool).
Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Leroy Sané (Manchester City).
Alberto Moreno (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Liverpool).
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses the top right corner.
Emre Can (Liverpool) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Emre Can (Liverpool).
Goal!  Manchester City 4, Liverpool 0. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Benjamin Mendy with a cross.
Foul by Sergio Agüero (Manchester City).
Emre Can (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
James Milner (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Ragnar Klavan.
Substitution, Manchester City. Eliaquim Mangala replaces Nicolás Otamendi.
James Milner (Liverpool) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Danilo (Manchester City).
Offside, Manchester City. Leroy Sané tries a through ball, but David Silva is caught offside.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Substitution, Liverpool. Dominic Solanke replaces Roberto Firmino.
Offside, Liverpool. Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain tries a through ball, but Trent Alexander-Arnold is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Leroy Sané.
Substitution, Liverpool. James Milner replaces Georginio Wijnaldum.
Substitution, Manchester City. Leroy Sané replaces Gabriel Jesus.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Emre Can.
Goal!  Manchester City 3, Liverpool 0. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Offside, Manchester City. Benjamin Mendy tries a through ball, but Sergio Agüero is caught offside.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by John Stones.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Benjamin Mendy (Manchester City).
Substitution, Liverpool. Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain replaces Mohamed Salah.
Second Half begins Manchester City 2, Liverpool 0.
First Half ends, Manchester City 2, Liverpool 0.
Goal!  Manchester City 2, Liverpool 0. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a cross.
John Stones (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool).
Offside, Manchester City. Kevin De Bruyne tries a through ball, but Gabriel Jesus is caught offside.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Alberto Moreno.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Manchester City. Claudio Bravo replaces Ederson because of an injury.
Delay in match Ederson (Manchester City) because of an injury.
Sadio Mané (Liverpool) is shown the red card.
Ederson (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sadio Mané (Liverpool).
Foul by Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City).
Sadio Mané (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. John Stones (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

Attempt saved. Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sadio Mané with a through ball.

Goal!  Manchester City 1, Liverpool 0. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a through ball.
Offside, Liverpool. Georginio Wijnaldum tries a through ball, but Joel Matip is caught offside.
